page.title: 11HOME LIFE IN EYKE PARISH
page.content:
The lives of people in the area tends to revolve around their homes, as illustrated by the attractive state of many of the gardens with their well laid out flower beds and vegetable gardens. Most households have pets; there are dogs and/or cats in many and donkeys, horses, goats and rabbits in some.
Theatres, cinemas and other entertain- ments are some miles away; the nearest public houses at Eyke and Butley would be generally considered as more than walking distance away.
Families needing babysitters ususlly have to fetch and return them. Thus, life tends to revolve more around the home than it might do in less isolated areas.
